    possum

    POSterior SUMmarization

    This is an R package companion to the paper “Model interpretation through posterior summarization” by Spencer Woody, Carlos M. Carvalho, and Jared S. Murray, Journal of Computational and Graphical Statistics, 2020 (link to JCGS paper, arXiv preprint).

    Installation

    ## install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("spencerwoody/possum")

    Contact

    Spencer Woody
    spencer(dot)woody(at)utexas(dot)edu
